description: This one pan chicken and rice traybake looks after itself in the oven and the result is a simple but satisfying dinner.
name: Spicy Chicken & Rice Traybake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3.2 cups chicken stock, hot, made with 1 stock cube
1 large red onion, peeled and finely sliced
8 medium chicken thighs, bone in, skin on

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the chicken stock, 4 tablespoons of curry paste and oil in a large jug. Tip the rice into a roasting tin, pour over the chicken stock mix and stir to combine.

Score the skin of the chicken thighs and spread each with the remaining curry paste. Tip the onion slices into the rice, nestle in the chicken thighs, cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes and 180Â°C.

Remove the foil, scatter over the peas, lemon juice and zest and mix the sultanas into the rice. Add a dash more water if necessary. Bake uncovered for 10-15 minutes until the chicken is cooked through. Serve with fresh coriander on top.
